Views.SQL: CREATE VIEW QUERY_Component AS SELECT Component.ComponentID, Component.PlantID, LocationPlant.PlantDescription, Component.ProcessUnitID, ProcessUnit.UnitDescription, Component.AreaID, LocationArea.AreaDescription, Component.BuildingID, LocationBuilding.BuildingDescription, Component.DepartmentID, LocationDepartment.DepartmentDescription, Component.Floor, Component.ComponentTag, Component.Drawing, Component.ComponentClassID, ComponentClass.ComponentClass, ComponentClass.ClassDescription, ComponentClass.MarsComponentClass, Component.ComponentTypeID, ComponentType.ComponentType, ComponentType.TypeDescription, Component.LocationDescription, Component.ComponentCategoryID, ComponentCategory.CategoryCode, ComponentCategory.CategoryDescription, Component.ComponentReasonID, ComponentReason.ComponentReason AS CategoryReason, ComponentReason.ReasonDescription, Component.Property, Component.NumberofPoints, Component.[Size], Component.OutofServiceCodeID, OutofServiceCode.OOSCode, OutofServiceCode.OOSDescription, Component.DateReturnedtoService, Component.Status, ComponentStatus.StatusDescription, Component.StatusDate, Component.ReasonforStatus, Component.DateAdded, Component.FITRouteID, Component.FITRouteSequence, Component.ManufacturerID, Manufacturer.ManufacturerCode, Manufacturer.ProductDescription AS ManufacturerDescription, Component.ComponentBatchID, ComponentBatch.ComponentBatch, ComponentBatch.ComponentBatchDescription AS BatchDescription, Component.PressureServiceID, ComponentPressureService.PressureService, ComponentPressureService.ServiceDescription, Component.ComponentStreamID, ComponentStream.ComponentStream, ComponentStream.StreamDescription, Component.ChemicalStateID, ChemicalState.ChemicalState, ChemicalState.StateDescription, Component.UserGroup1, Component.UserGroup2, Component.UserGroup3, Component.UserGroup4, Component.UserGroup5, Component.ComponentDesignation, Component.ComponentLDASTag FROM Component INNER JOIN ProcessUnit ON Component.ProcessUnitID = ProcessUnit.ProcessUnitID INNER JOIN LocationPlant ON Component.PlantID = LocationPlant.PlantID INNER JOIN ComponentClass ON Component.ComponentClassID = ComponentClass.ComponentClassID INNER JOIN ComponentStatus ON Component.Status = ComponentStatus.StatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN ChemicalState ON Component.ChemicalStateID = ChemicalState.ChemicalStateID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentStream ON Component.ComponentStreamID = ComponentStream.ComponentStreamID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentPressureService ON Component.PressureServiceID = ComponentPressureService.PressureServiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentBatch ON Component.ComponentBatchID = ComponentBatch.ComponentBatchID LEFT OUTER JOIN Manufacturer ON Component.ManufacturerID = Manufacturer.ManufacturerID LEFT OUTER JOIN OutofServiceCode ON Component.OutofServiceCodeID = OutofServiceCode.OOSCodeID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentReason ON Component.ComponentReasonID = ComponentReason.ComponentReasonID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentCategory ON Component.ComponentCategoryID = ComponentCategory.ComponentCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentType ON Component.ComponentTypeID = ComponentType.ComponentTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationDepartment ON Component.DepartmentID = LocationDepartment.DepartmentID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationBuilding ON Component.BuildingID = LocationBuilding.BuildingID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationArea ON Component.AreaID = LocationArea.AreaID;

CREATE VIEW QUERY_ComponentLastInspection AS SELECT ComponentLastInspection.ComponentLastInspectionID, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentID, ComponentLastInspection.ResponseFactor, ComponentLastInspection.PlantID, LocationPlant.PlantDescription, ComponentLastInspection.AreaID, LocationArea.AreaDescription, ComponentLastInspection.DepartmentID, LocationDepartment.DepartmentDescription, ComponentLastInspection.BuildingID, LocationBuilding.BuildingDescription, ComponentLastInspection.Floor, ComponentLastInspection.ProcessUnitID, ProcessUnit.UnitDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentBatchID, ComponentBatch.ComponentBatch, ComponentBatch.ComponentBatchDescription, ComponentLastInspection.Location, ComponentLastInspection.Property, ComponentLastInspection.Drawing, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentTag, ComponentLastInspection.NumberofPoints, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentClassID, ComponentClass.ComponentClass, ComponentClass.ClassDescription, ComponentClass.MarsComponentClass, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentTypeID, ComponentType.ComponentType, ComponentType.TypeDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ManufacturerID, Manufacturer.ManufacturerCode, Manufacturer.ProductDescription AS ManufacturerDescription, ComponentLastInspection.[Size], ComponentLastInspection.PressureServiceID, ComponentPressureService.PressureService, ComponentPressureService.ServiceDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ChemicalStateID, ChemicalState.ChemicalState, ChemicalState.StateDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentStreamID, ComponentStream.ComponentStream, ComponentStream.StreamDescription, ComponentLastInspection.OOSCodeID, OutofServiceCode.OOSCode, OutofServiceCode.OOSDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ReturntoService, ComponentLastInspection.SensoryVisualResult, ComponentLastInspection.MaximumAllowed, ComponentLastInspection.CalibrationID, ComponentLastInspection.Tested, ComponentLastInspection.Uploaded, ComponentLastInspection.NewRecord, ComponentLastInspection.NewRoute, ComponentLastInspection.Edited, ComponentLastInspection.Deleted, ComponentLastInspection.DeleteReason, ComponentLastInspection.DeleteDate, ComponentLastInspection.WorkOrder, ComponentLastInspection.ErrorText, ComponentLastInspection.FITRouteSequence, ComponentLastInspection.RecordAdded, ComponentLastInspection.InspectionDate, ComponentLastInspection.InspectionBackground, ComponentLastInspection.InspectionMaximum, ComponentLastInspection.M21Results, ComponentLastInspection.InspectionRepair, ComponentLastInspection.InspectionNotes, ComponentLastInspection.Inspector, ComponentLastInspection.Instrument, ComponentLastInspection.RetestDate, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentCategoryID, ComponentCategory.CategoryCode, ComponentCategory.CategoryDescription, ComponentLastInspection.ComponentReasonID, ComponentReason.ComponentReason AS CategoryReason, ComponentReason.ReasonDescription, ComponentLastInspection.UserGroup1, ComponentLastInspection.UserGroup2, ComponentLastInspection.UserGroup3, ComponentLastInspection.UserGroup4, ComponentLastInspection.UserGroup5, ComponentLastInspection.RepairedBy, ComponentLastInspection.Errors FROM ComponentLastInspection LEFT OUTER JOIN OutofServiceCode ON OutofServiceCode.OOSCodeID = ComponentLastInspection.OOSCodeID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentType ON ComponentType.ComponentTypeID = ComponentLastInspection.ComponentTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentClass ON ComponentLastInspection.ComponentClassID = ComponentClass.ComponentClassID LEFT OUTER JOIN Manufacturer ON ComponentLastInspection.ManufacturerID = Manufacturer.ManufacturerID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentStream ON ComponentLastInspection.ComponentStreamID = ComponentStream.ComponentStreamID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentReason ON ComponentLastInspection.ComponentReasonID = ComponentReason.ComponentReasonID AND ComponentType.ComponentTypeID = ComponentLastInspection.ComponentTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentPressureService ON ComponentLastInspection.PressureServiceID = ComponentPressureService.PressureServiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN ProcessUnit ON ComponentLastInspection.ProcessUnitID = ProcessUnit.ProcessUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentCategory ON ComponentLastInspection.ComponentCategoryID = ComponentCategory.ComponentCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN ChemicalState ON ComponentLastInspection.ChemicalStateID = ChemicalState.ChemicalStateID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationDepartment ON ComponentLastInspection.DepartmentID = LocationDepartment.DepartmentID LEFT OUTER JOIN ComponentBatch ON ComponentLastInspection.ComponentBatchID = ComponentBatch.ComponentBatchID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationBuilding ON ComponentLastInspection.BuildingID = LocationBuilding.BuildingID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationArea ON ComponentLastInspection.AreaID = LocationArea.AreaID LEFT OUTER JOIN LocationPlant ON ComponentLastInspection.PlantID = LocationPlant.PlantID
CREATE VIEW REPORT_UnitArea AS SELECT UnitDescription, AreaDescription, StatusDescription, COUNT(ComponentID) FROM QUERY_Component GROUP BY UnitDescription, AreaDescription, StatusDescription;
